column5:
I am sorry your family is abusing and repressing you. While your kinks may be obscure, as long as they are between consenting adults and don't involve death, murder, or children you shouldn't be too ashamed. 

Explore what you need to explore without being too ashamed, you only get one life. You didn't nescesarilly choose what you are into. It just happens. Don't bash yourself. Don't let your family bash on you. 

Perhaps try to gain control of the frequency of masturbation though so it doesn't eventually become a porn addiction problem. 

I wish you luck. You're human just like the rest of us.
Your parent sounds like a narcisist
Have you been to r/raisedbynarcisists ?
I don't eat with them, but i can still hear them. :(
I just said in the post I might have it. Regardless. My nparents do it loud and on purpose to make me upset because they enjoy upsetting me.
Same. I'm always trying to avoid them. Its insane.
Its not fair having to be stuck with nparents alone. I wish I had a goddamn girlfriend. But no. Theres no lesbians where I live and I have slim pickings anyhow.
Yes. Mine do it all the time and then get giddy and bash on our generation.
Thank you
I have recorded my nparents abuse before. Got in trouble. I cant risk being homeless again during a pandemic, even with this disability thats a death sentence
Im not allowed to have a lock on my bedroom door
He is a disgusting father

I think I'm doing something similar. I still live with my parents for now, so a lot of belongings held bad vibes. 

I might have been over analyzing myself because if it were really bad id never be satisfied and calm afterwards.
I just had to take down my posters and re arrange the 2 that dont give me distress. I agree though, having less stuff isnt as stressful

My parents scream bloody murder at me, chase me, beat me, and have taken away my door before when I was (11 and rightfully mad). Teenagers can slam doors, they just do that. Yet if my parents do that at 5am its "allowed"... if I use the blender at 3pm in the afternoon after a hard day landscaping, I am "a selfish c*nt". 

Nparents suck.
Theyre pieces of shit for laughing. Just remember that theyre bad. You arent.
I have constant repetetive night terrors of trauma replaying and it makes me want to commit suicide. I am going through this right now.
Hopefully ill fall asleep, and yes. Get rest
I cant shoot myself because i have no gun.
I cant start a new life when my abusers made me dissbled. Im not capable of escaping.

It doesnt matter. My abuser is famous and loved. My family are wealthy and they think their abuse was justified. My abusers lead happy lives. 

I need to kill myself.
Therapy doesnt work. Meds dont work. Hospitals dont work.
Im already in trauma therapy
I want help but the majority of me knows it doesnt exist.
Dm me if you want my gamertag
LMAO
Sadly I agree. This world is unjust.
I dont look at it. If i go and read a webtoon, her thing is fucking featured right there on the front page.
Its been 4 years. Nothing changed. They just got more successful and im still traumatized.
Im already in trauma therapy. I have night terrors. All the time. Featuring that abuser.
I'm 22. I have no one. I am not disabled enough to qualify for financial support. I exhausted all avenues.
Mentally. Verbally. Emotionally.
I am a woman. And im suicidal because I am abused.

You said "you". 

Try being fucking beaten down by life repeatedly.
I am disabled. I cannot escape. Most of these people are online.
Fuck off. You have no idea the abuse and shit I have endured.
Because I am disabled.
Im already working my ass off to get out of my abusive household. I am trying to fucking get out of here and have my own happy life.
I am disconnected. But I keep seeing them everywhere.

I was abused. Discarded. 
I am unwanted. My hard work is for nothing, I cannot escape my abusive household.
Preferences are allowed. Whats horrible are the cunts that called me hideous.
Try growing up obeese against your will. Losing it all. And working hard. I deserve love.
I dont smoke. I have in the past not frequently.
Weed makes me suicidal

Webtoons features her on the front page. She's doing very well. None of her supporters would believe me if i told them what she fucking did to me.

She has me blocked, and I have had her blocked... for years now. 

Her sociopathic circle of friends I used to be part of all applaud her. One told me to kill myself and said everything I experienced was "false slander!" 

I am swept under the rug and alone. 

I am best left to just kill myself. She called me a lost cause and mislead me and discarded me.
Personally, as someone with a deformity, I would not judge my partner for having one. Most people are sadly shallow and mean.

I (22f) have very deformed breasts and chest also, from extreme weight loss. I have been rejected and called hideous. I am alone. I am still alone and highly suicidal because of this.

I sadly can't give advice, but you are not alone.
I am working hard. I am unfortunatley not capable of escape like normal people and I am alone and unwanted. I need to commit suicide. My hard work is for nothing.
That friend of mine was one of my many abusers. She physically, verbally, and emotionally abused me. Now she's a well known webcomic artist on webtoons.
Thank you. But i dont know you, I also dont think youve seen me.
My body is hideous and deformed. I am tired of being born with weird facial features. I wish I wasnt rejected by hundreds of women
Im already involved with 3 case workers, not lawyers but more of social worker type thing. They have tried and exhausted all avenues. Theres not much that can be done.
Im not physically beaten. I am mentally and verbally abused. I dont qualify for disability money. Yet I cant hold a fucking job. Cant fucking afford a lawyer.
Im 22 almost 23. Im too disabled to escape. I need to just kill myself.
Suicide hotline is horse shit and doesnt help. I have trauma therapy. Its beyond unfair my abusers lead happy lives and my hard work gets me fucking nothing.
I dont think it will come to that, but i love the idea of stealth so no one would guess im just some girl living in a van. Esp considering im female and alone. I want to remain safe. Thank you!
I want stealth for the soul purpose of if and when the economy crashes, and somehow van living is outlawed, I'll be fine.
Fake
Hey thats me. Im the goldfish
I cant get to orlando. I have no one there I know, my motorcycle isnt good for highways (its a grom 125cc) and I have nowhere to stay. I dont have the luxury of spending money on a hotel.
I want it to last me a long time. I'm not looking for a mini van. I live in new england. Rust is rampant here. Its hard to find a good van for even 4k.
I can do a little bit. So thats reassuring to hear! I'll try to get one below 150k miles if I can.
Do you suppose I could make one of those last me 5 years? I dont want van living to be long term. Just under 5 years until i hopfully find a girlfriend
Safer than a homeless shelter
Vent to me if you want. You need to dump that pathetic excuse of a "man". Fuck him. He's absolutely batshit and horrible. Leave him. Fucking leave him.
I can only hope I get good news in my life for once. Glad you have good things your way though.
I hope so too. Im trying to escape, but it is not easy. Im not financially able to get out and ive got no one else in my life to live with.
They dont love me. See my post history. Im a lesbian and they've thrown me out, laughed at me when finding out i was groped and molested.
Did you cut some people out that perhaps you shouldn't have?
Its not a contest. Being trapped with abusive family is distressing regardless.
I'm sorry you're also stuck with abusive family
Those people are assholes. They are fucking low life assholes. You are human, its ok you reacted like you did. I am sorry you are in so much distress.
I feel the exact same way
I do not enjoy much. Food is not a good coping skill and I cannot focus or enjoy movies.
You're a piece of shit.

My fucking parents hate me because I'm a lesbian. They laughed at me and shit talked me when I was molested and groped by homeless men. I have no friends. My ex best friend abused me and got away with it and her and her sociopathic friends shit talked me and laughed at me while I was homeless and struggling. 

I fucking have no one. I need to fucking kill myself.
So many kids said i was unhygenic and tourmented me, all because my mom smoked around us and in the car until id get sick.
Thankyou. Im trying. Its difficult when I dont really have friends and all my family hates me.

I was happy. I got some side work to make money to escape this abusive household. It was warm and sunny so I could ride my motorcycle. Simple pleasures in life made me smile. My dog was excited to see me. The photo in question:

http://imgur.com/a/Ic8IADT

I have a learning disability but im not autistic. I am suicidal that people thought it was ok to say I'm retarded and autistic.
I'm american and I take my shoes off at the door. I can't stand dirt being tracked through my house.
That's upsetting that they use it as an insult. My little brothers got conditioned to doing that to each other after learning it from my nparents. Its just wrong.
If you need to vent, feel free to hit up my dm's.

Nparents love to use the cops as a weapon on us. I remember during the 2016 presidential election, trump emboldened them to say hateful things about gays until I got sad. Accidentally outed myself from frustration, they escalated it until i rage kicked a bucket of pencils over. They called the cops and lied to the cops. Cops thankfully saw nfamily ganging up against me and told them to shut up, but hospitalized me for being suicidal.
Your mom is terrible
I can relate to this... sadly. Let me know if you want to venr.
I don't know how to find out if theres spyware on my phone. What are some called? I have an android. My parents seem to know my search history and mock me and i dont know how they know.
I had no idea tracking apps were possible...
I dont fucking have anyone and those hotlines are bullshit. I have a therapist.

Thanos Peter. 

Thanos Peter.
Peter thanos. Peter thanos
I dont qualify. I need to fucking kill myself.
Mentally I am unable to hold a job. I am too high functioning to recieve disability.
Thats a very positive quote. But still in my case life isnt likely to be kind to me
No. I have nothing. I need to die.
I am too disabled to move out. I dont think you understand.
I have no friends.... must be fucking nice to have friends!!! What the hell. I have NO ONE in my fucking life. I need to kill myself.

Cant live in shared housing due to being repeatedly harmed by people ive lived with. I scream and have night terrors. I am too high functioning for group homes for mentally ill adults nor do i want to be subjected to their traumatizing behavior.
It might not.
I am trying hard to wait until i turn 30, which is 7 or 8 years from now. But still.
For life to stop beating me down.
